name: FIFA World Cup
title: The Pinnacle of International Football
description: The FIFA World Cup is the top global football event, where teams from around the world compete for the coveted trophy. It's a month-long celebration of soccer, showcasing the best talent globally.

name: UEFA Champions League
title: Europe's Premier Club Competition
description: The UEFA Champions League gathers Europe's top football clubs in a battle for supremacy. Known for intense matches and iconic moments, legends are made here.

name: Copa America
title: South America's Football Showpiece
description: Copa America is the oldest international football tournament, featuring the best South American teams. Known for passionate fans and breathtaking football.

name: Copa Libertadores
title: The Quest for South American Glory
description: Copa Libertadores is South America's top club competition, where clubs compete for a chance to be champions. It's a showcase of skill and determination.

name: African Cup of Nations
title: Africa's Football Extravaganza
description: AFCON brings together Africa's top national teams for an intense competition. It's a platform for African talent to shine on the world stage.

name: UEFA European Championship
title: Europe's Battle for Supremacy
description: The UEFA European Championship, commonly known as the Euro, is a prestigious international tournament that pits Europe's best national teams against each other.

name: Copa del Rey
title: Spain's Premier Cup Competition
description: Copa del Rey is Spain's top domestic cup competition, featuring La Liga's top clubs. It's a chance for underdogs to upset the giants and claim glory.

name: FIFA Club World Cup
title: The Clash of Club Champions
description: The FIFA Club World Cup brings together champions from each continent, creating a global showdown. It's where club teams prove their mettle on a worldwide stage.

name: Indian Super League (ISL)
title: India's Football Revolution
description: The Indian Super League has reshaped football in India, featuring a mix of domestic and international stars. It's a growing force in Asian football, attracting fans nationwide.
